text: Jean Frédéric Bazille (6 December 1841 – 28 November 1870) was a French painter. He was born in Montpellier. He was killed in action in the Franco- Prussian War. It was at the Battle of Beaune-la-Rolande in France while leading his unit into a assault on the German position. He died at the age of 28. Category:1841 births Category:1870 deaths Category:Deaths by firearm Category:French painters Category:Military people killed in action
title: Frédéric Bazille
